title: On target marketing: retailing and services; manufacturing
creator_credit: Paul Humfress, Tony Coyte and Film Australia
brief_description: Marketing techniques are described and illustrated through a sequence of case studies which show how successful small business owners developed a marketing strategy which contributed to the growth and increased profitability of their businesses. This program takes examples of small businesses from the manufacturing, retail and service sectors.
